books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Who will end up dead, and how, when three mothers with children in the same school become friends?
books.name: BIG LITTLE LIES

books.author: by Tess Gerritsen
books.description: The hunt for a killer takes Detective Jane Rizzoli and medical examiner Maura Isles from Boston to Botswana.
books.name: DIE AGAIN

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A lawyer joins a legal clinic in a small Virginia town, and becomes involved in litigation against the coal mining industry.
books.name: GRAY MOUNTAIN

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: John Puller, a special agent with the Army, hunts for his brother, who was convicted of treason and has escaped from prison.
books.name: THE ESCAPE

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: The Los Angeles detective Harry Bosch and his new partner investigate two long-unsolved cases.
books.name: THE BURNING ROOM

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: Detective Alex Cross’s family is kidnapped by a madman who wants to turn Cross into a perfect killer.
books.name: HOPE TO DIE

books.author: by Karina Halle
books.description: Years ago, Steph and Linden made a promise to each other. Now it's time to test their commitment.
books.name: THE PACT

books.author: by Fern Michaels
books.description: When a powerful family tries to reclaim twins who were legally given up at birth, their loving but poor adoptive parents turn to Myra Rutledge and her formidable Sisterhood for help.
books.name: EYES ONLY

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman who was spared when her mother and sisters were murdered begins to reinvestigate the case against her imprisoned brother.
books.name: DARK PLACES

books.author: by Brad Taylor
books.description: Pike Logan and his partner, Jennifer Cahill, members of a secret counterterrorist unit called the Taskforce, contend with a well-coordinated hostage seizure.
books.name: NO FORTUNATE SON

books.author: by W. E. B. Griffin and William E. Butterworth IV
books.description: The second novel in a new series about the Cold War and the early C.I.A.
books.name: THE ASSASSINATION OPTION

books.author: by Sherryl Woods
books.description: When Aidan Mitchell, a former football player, takes a high school coaching job in Chesapeake Shores, he's embraced by the town — especially the O'Briens. But Aidan has a secret that could alter their lives.
books.name: DOGWOOD HILL

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An innocent college student falls in love with a tortured man with particular sexual tastes; the first of a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY
